text:
February 2?, 1957
Dr. Burton Paulu
K U 0 M, One Eddy Hall
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
Just a note to report that I did have opportunity
to visit with the Hulls in Columbus. Spent Sunday
evening discussing dear ol* NAEB and friends. Also,
talked with Keith on Monday morning, although didnâ€™t see
him. His only day in town and he was unusually busy.
All seemed well and happy.
And the Illini did to Ohio State what we'll try to
do to the Gophers down here Saturday.
Regards,
Frank E. Schooley
FES:nb
